General.Name: Shreyas Shipping & Logistics Limited
General.Description: Shreyas Shipping and Logistics Limited provides coastal container shipping in India and internationally. It owns and operates container feeder. As of March 31, 2023, the company owned and operated a fleet of 12 container vessels with a total capacity of 26,105 TEUs; 2,76,484 GRT; and 3,47,061 DW; and 2 dry bulk vessels with a total capacity of 44,992 MT GRT and 69,402 MT DWT. Shreyas Shipping and Logistics Limited was incorporated in 1988 and is based in Mumbai, India. The company is a subsidiary of Transworld Holdings Limited.
General.Address: D-301-305, Tower II, Navi Mumbai, India, 400706
